project_descr: The Project has been developed to enable the different levels of Iraqi government and communities to reduce losses and damages from natural and human-induced disasters by adopting effective mitigation and preparedness approaches

outputs.output_descr: Establishing Disaster Risk reduction Policies and institutions, creating capacities for human resources development, through provision of High-quality advisory services.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

project_title: developing disaster risk management capacities in iraq
